<js>
// ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç å‹¿åŠ¨ï¼
function atob(input) {
/*æ­£æ–‡è§£å¯†by: Yoloã€‚å†™æºè§£å¯†jsä¸æ˜“ï¼Œç¦æ­¢è½¬è½½ï¼*/
  const chars = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/='; 
  let str = String(input).replace(/=+$/, '');
  let output = '';  
  for (let bc = 0, bs = 0, buffer, i = 0; buffer = str.charAt(i++); ~buffer && (bs = bc % 4 ? bs * 64 + buffer : buffer, bc++ % 4) ? output += String.fromCharCode(255 & bs >> (-2 * bc & 6)) : 0) {
    buffer = chars.indexOf(buffer);
  }
  return output;
}

function decodeStr(arr) {
    let result = '';
    for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
        result += String.fromCharCode(arr[i]);
    }
    return decodeURIComponent(escape(result));
}

function decode(s, k) {
    let K = Array.from(k).map(a => a.charCodeAt(0));
    let S = atob(s).split('').map(a => a.charCodeAt(0));
    let g = S.map((h, i) => h ^ K[i % K.length]);
    return decodeStr(g);
}

let c = src.match(/await _.+\(\'([^']+)\','([^']+)'\)/);

let reg = /[^a-zA-Z0-9\u4e00-\u9fa5\s\.,:;?!'"()-<>ã€ã€‚ï¼Œï¼›ï¼šâ€œâ€â€˜â€™ï¼ˆï¼‰ã€ã€‘ã€Šã€‹"]/g
result = result.replace(reg, '')

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

    var b = a + "=";

    }

</js>

time = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000).toString()

function getSign (key, type, num) {
  const { java } = this
  const secret = 'magic2019'
  let baseString

  switch (type) {
    case 's':
      baseString = `channel=ft0001&gid=2&nci=1&nsc=0&query=${java.encodeURI(key)}&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    case 't':
      baseString = `bid=${key}&channel=ft0001&gid=1&nci=1&nsc=1&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    case 'c':
      baseString = `bid=${key}&channel=ft0001&chapterid=${num}&gid=2&nci=1&nsc=1&timestamp=${time}&secret=${secret}`
      break
    default:
      throw new Error('Invalid type')
  }

  return java.md5Encode(baseString).toUpperCase()
}

<js>

//ç¬¬ä¸€ç§æ–¹æ³•
url="http:"+result.match(/<script>initTxt\(\"([^\s]+)\",/)[1];
result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");
